This Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy/Policy") uncovers the privacy rehearses for VedicTree Educare Private Limited ("VedicTree Educare Pvt Ltd", "We/we" or "Us/us") concerning Your ("You/you" or "Your/your") utilization of the website www.VedicTreeschool.com ("Website"). It likewise portrays your decisions with respect to utilize, access and revision of your own data and your privileges according to your own data and how to reach us or administrative experts in the occasion you have a grievance.

By visiting this Website, you consent to be limited by the terms and states of this Privacy Policy. If it\'s not too much trouble, read this Privacy Policy cautiously. By utilizing the Website, you demonstrate that you comprehend, concur and agree to this Privacy Policy. On the off chance that you disagree with the provisions of this Privacy Policy, kindly don\'t utilize/access this Website.

To ensure you know about any changes, kindly audit this Policy occasionally. In the event that you are our enrolled client, we will tell you before we make changes to this Policy and offer you the chance to survey the reconsidered Policy before you decide to keep utilizing our administrations.By Personal Data, we mean any information that can either itself identify you as an individual ("Personally Identifying Information ") or that can be connected to you indirectly by linking it to Personally Identifying Information

As a guest, you can peruse our Website to discover more about our Website. You are not needed to furnish us with any Personal Data as a guest. We will just gather your Personal Data on the off chance that we have an appropriate justification doing as such, e.g.: to follow our lawful and administrative commitments; for the exhibition of our agreement with you or to make strides at your solicitation prior to going into an agreement; for our authentic advantages or those of an outsider; or where you have given assent. At times, we may likewise have a lawful commitment to gather individual data from you or may somehow require the individual data to secure your essential advantages or those of someone else (for instance, to forestall installment misrepresentation or affirm your personality

Our essential objective in gathering your Personal Data and other individual data is to give you a protected, proficient, smooth and redid experience. This permits us to give courses, study material, instructional exercises that most probable address your issues and to redo our Website to make your experience more secure and simpler. We additionally utilize your Personal Identifiable Information along with other Personally Non-Identifiable Information to assist us with bettering our clients and to improve the substance and usefulness of our Website. The data we gain from you assists us with customizing and consistently improve your involvement with our Website. We don\'t willfully make this data accessible to outsiders, nor do we use it for some other reason, besides as set out thus.

At the point when you visit our Website, as a component of an acquisition of one of our courses or enrolling on our Website, we may gather an assortment of data that you will intentionally give to us by means of one of our contact structures, through a talk or telephone meeting (Personal Identifying Information, for example,
• Contact Information, such as name, email address, display picture, mailing address, phone number, IP address, geographic location, or phone number

• Unique Identifiers, such as username or password;
• Reviews or ratings, syllabus and course preferences, account settings, (including preferences set in the " Account " section of our Website); and
• Information provided to us through our service, interaction with our customer service, participation in surveys or marketing promotions.

We gather data about you and your utilization of our administration, your associations with us just as data in regards to your PC or other gadget used to get to our administration). This data remembers your movement for our Website, like classes, study materials, courses, and search inquiries;

subtleties of your cooperations with client care, like the date, time, and justification reaching us, records of any talk discussions, and in the event that you call us, your telephone number and call chronicles; gadget IDs or other one of a kind identifiers, gadget and programming attributes (like sort and setup), association data, measurements on online visits, alluding source ( for instance, reference URLs ), IP address (which may disclose to us your overall area), program and standard web worker log data, data gathered by means of the utilization of treats, web signals and different advancements.

With the assistance of back-end applications, we target offering better types of assistance and better cooperation with educators, contingent upon the recipient\'s line of interest. All installment exchanges are prepared through secure installment door suppliers. We don\'t store any card data (other than the last 4 digits of your card) in our workers.

We utilize the individual data we gather, including your Personal Data where it is important to convey the administrations you have mentioned, where it is important to practice or conform to lawful rights or commitments, or for typical business motivations behind the caring set out in this Policy.

We will utilize your own data to give, dissect, regulate and improve our administrations, to give you a customized insight on our Website (particularly, by offering you benefits that is most appropriate for you), to reach you about your record and our administrations, to give you client care, to furnish you with customized promoting and to recognize, forestall, relieve and examine fake or criminal operations.

We further utilize your own data to decide your overall geographic area, give limited courses and classes, give you redid and customized study material, suggestions, decide your Internet specialist co-op, and help us rapidly and productively react to requests and demands and upholding our terms, (for example, deciding free preliminary qualification) and speak with you concerning our administration (for instance by email, message pop-ups, text informing, and web-based informing channels), so we can send you insights regarding new highlights and substance accessible on the Website, extraordinary offers, limited-time declarations, reviews, and to help you with operational demands, for example, secret word reset demands.

We utilize different organizations, specialists, or workers for hire ("Service Providers") to perform administrations for our sake or to help us with the arrangement of administrations to you. We draw in Service Providers to give promoting, publicizing, correspondences, framework and IT administrations, to customize and upgrade our administration, to handle charge card exchanges or other installment techniques, to give client assistance, to gather obligations, to break down and improve information (counting information about clients cooperations with our administration), and to measure and oversee buyer studies. We don\'t approve them to utilize or unveil your own data besides regarding offering their types of assistance.

We will attempt to avoid potential risk to ensure the individual data both on the web and disconnected. We will attempt to ensure your data utilizing specialized and authoritative security measures to diminish the dangers of misfortune, abuse, unapproved access, divulgence and adjustment. We have standard SSL certificate which essentially assists us with making a safe association between our worker and client to deliver any data or activity. A portion of the shields we use are firewalls and information encryption, actual access controls to our server farms and data access approval controls. Just client passwords are scrambled in 64-digit encryption and put away on the grounds that by and large clients utilize similar secret word on various locales, to forestall any sort of burglary, theft or unapproved access. In the event that you accept your record has been manhandled or hacked, if its not too much trouble, get in touch with us by sending us an email at info@VedicTree Educare Pvt Ltd.com.

We dont sell, move or lease your own data to outsiders for their advertising purposes without your express assent and we just utilize your data as depicted in the Privacy Policy. We see assurance of your security as a vital local area standard. We see unmistakably that you and your Information is one of our most significant resources. We store and interaction your own data on PCs situated in India that are ensured by physical just as innovative security gadgets. We utilize outsiders to confirm and ensure our security standards. By no means, we lease, exchange, move or offer your own data that we have gathered with some other organization for their advertising purposes without your assent. We maintain all authority to convey your own data to any outsider that makes a legitimately consistent solicitation for its exposure.

We have appropriate security measures to prevent your Personal Data from being accidentally lost or used or accessed unlawfully. Processing your Personal Data will be done only in an authorized manner and subject to a duty of confidentiality. We also have procedures–in place to deal with any suspected data security breach. We will notify you about any applicable regulator of a suspected data security breach where we are legally required to do so.Notwithstanding anything contained anywhere in this Agreement; we cannot assure absolute security to your personal data and by entering into or by logging into our website, you explicitly agree not to sue us for any data breach.

We transfer cookies, which are small files containing a string of character, to your IP address, giving the browser distinct identification, in order to keep track of the user’s preferences. Furthermore, these files also help in logging-in faster and they act as a mechanism to determine user trends. The data thus retrieved from the user’s IP address, enables us to enhance our offers, including but not limited to more content in areas of greater interest to a majority of users.Our Website uses "Cookies" to identify the areas of our Website that you have visited. A Cookie is a small piece of data stored on your computer or mobile device by your web browser. We use Cookies to personalize the Content that you see on our Website. Most web browsers can be set to disable the use of Cookies. However, if you disable Cookies, you may not be able to access functionality on our Website correctly or at all. We never place Personally Identifiable Information in Cookies.

We use Third Party Payment Gateway to process payments securely. if, as a Student, you wish to cancel a confirmed enrolment made via the Site or the Application, after enrolment to the Course, the cancellation policy contained in the applicable Listing will apply to such cancellation provided that no refund will be made in respect of tuitions already provided. Our ability to refund the Course Fees and other amounts charged to you will depend upon the terms of the applicable cancellation policy and financial charges applicable in case of course payment through No Cost EMI options. Details regarding refunds and cancellation policies are available via the Site and Application. VedicTree Educare Pvt Ltd will Not initiate any refunds due pursuant to the Payments Terms. All our Products are Non- Refundable.

If We cancel a confirmed enrolment made via the Site, Services, and Application, (i) VedicTree Educare Pvt Ltd will refund the Course Fees paid by the Student for such enrolment to the applicable Student pursuant to the Payments Terms which shall not exceed the total amount paid by the Student.
We ship to almost all locations in India where there is reach of the Indian Postal Network.

When you place an order, the estimated shipping/dispatch and estimated delivery time will be specified based on the availability of the item, your delivery location and coverage by our empanelled couriers. Generally the dispatch timeline falls under below categories:
All the items will clearly mention the approximate shipping time.
Please allow 24-48 hours for processing, as we do not ship out on weekends or holidays. You can expect the delivery within 5-7 Business days (In areas where standard courier service is available).
Our books are placed for shipment immediately after the enrolment. The maximum turnaround time is 30 days for Shipment
Our courier: FedEx courier, India Postal Service , DTDC and EZship .

Major destinations are serviced by known national courier companies and deliveries normally take 1-4 days. You can track the status and location of your parcel after dispatch on the respective courier\'s website using the parcel\'s tracking code. Remote locations where there is no coverage by our empaneled couriers get serviced through India Post, a Government of India undertaking. Delivery through India Post normally takes longer and could extend to more than 2 weeks for some locations and rare situations.
Kindly be patient - inform us if there is an inordinate delay and we will follow up with India Post.
If you have any questions regarding shipping feel free to e-mail us at info@VedicTreeSchool.com and we would be happy to help.
